title: FS: T206 Walter Johnson Portrait (Piedmont Back)
author: statsfax

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Walter Johnson Portrait (Piedmont Back)
posts.post_content:
I have a T206 Walter Johnson portrait card available. Asking $1200 via PP F&F. I will pay postage and insurance. Please send DMs to purchase or ask questions. Thanks for looking!

--Dan

I've had a few inquiries about this card, but it is still currently available. Feel free to make an offer via DM if you are interested in owning it and would like to negotiate. Thanks for looking!

--Dan
